text: Feel Special is the eighth EP by the South Korean girl group Twice. It was released by JYP Entertainment on September 23, 2019, and features the title track of the same name as well as a Korean version of their Japanese single "Breakthrough". It follows their April 2019 EP Fancy You. ==Single== "Feel Special" was the single from the EP, released on September 23 under JYP Entertainment Label. Debuted and peaked at #9 on Gaon Digital Chart, making this their lowest debut in the chart since "Like OOH-AHH" in 2015. As of 4 June of 2020, "Feel Special" has sold over 200,000 units in the US. The song will be featured in Just Dance 2021. ==Track listing== Adapted from the group's official website.
